name: Azelf
author: Ryo Ueda
flavor_text: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

poke_body.name: Downer Material
poke_body.effect: If you have Uxie and Mesprit in play, the attack cost of each of your opponent’s Basic Pokémon’s attacks is {C} more. You can’t use more than 1 Downer Material Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Bind Pulse
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, your opponent can’t attach any Special Energy cards from his or her hand to any of his or her Pokémon.
